title: New I'm A Celebrity teaser sees Ant and Dec head for Australia ahead of launch
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest I'm a Celebrity stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

ITV have released a hilarious second teaser for I'm A Celebrity 2019, featuring hosts Ant McPartlin and Dec Donnelly, ahead of the line-up confirmation with it set to start next month.

An initial teaser earlier this month did see Ant and Dec lost and requiring help from fans to send them on their way to the Australian jungle.

It doesn't appear they're getting anywhere though, with viewers choosing for them to face Arctic Antics as the next part of the journey.

It's thought viewers will get to pick the next part too, while no start date has been officially confirmed for the new series as of yet.

The new promo will premiere for the first time on ITV on Friday night.

(Image: ITV)

In the short clip, Dec appears completely frozen admitting he's "freezing" and "famished".

Ant, though, is completely ice-free and leaves his pal furious when he unveils his two sets of gloves he's had the entire time.

His option for food, ice lollies, doesn't go down well with Dec either as they head on through the icy waters.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

But where will the boys end up next? Viewers will have to keep their eyes peeled.

It appears they may have taken a wrong turn after initially being stuck in the middle of the ocean, with Ant losing their map in the wind.

They're headed for Australia, where the jungle series is filmed every year - but who are this year's camp mates?

(Image: ITV)

Rumours are in full spin, with names including Good Morning Britain host Kate Garraway tipped to join.

Kate was forced to address the rumours live on GMB last week, while she denied the claims.

Other names in the mix include Love Island's Olivia Attwood , Amy Hart, Peter Crouch, Brendan Cole and Nadine Coyle.

I'm A Celebrity 2019 launches on ITV in November.
description: A second teaser for I'm A Celebrity 2019 showed hosts Ant McPartlin and Dec Donnelly in trouble in the Arctic
